name: Distant Signal
description:
Story

You are an acclaimed explorer travelling through the far reaches of space, when you pick up a strange signal from an abandoned, ancient alien tomb. This signal is very faint and is nothing like you have ever encountered before. You decide to enter the mysterious tomb, and find that the path to the source of the signal is filled with deadly obstacles and challenges. Will you reach the signal before it dissipates? or will the secrets of this tomb will be lost forever

Gameplay

Explore and traverse a hostile tomb filled with traps  using your jet pack and different movement abilities. Discover hidden hieroglyphs to decipher the message left behind by an ancient civillization. 

Controls The Team Design and production

Will Okolo | Mihail Kostov | Michael Hadas Roffman | Luca Yavuzok | Damien Suurmond

Visual art

Programming
